EgyptianNinjaPracticesNinjutsuOnHisFarm.name: Egyptian ninja practices Ninjutsu on his farm
EgyptianNinjaPracticesNinjutsuOnHisFarm.summary: Abdel Qader Ahmed, an Egyptian ninja enthusiast, performs tricks on his farm using swords he made himself and has taught others who have expressed interest in the ancient Japanese art.

Japan'SNextGenerationNinjas(LearningWorl.name: Japan's Next Generation Ninjas (Learning World S4E36, 1/3)
Japan'SNextGenerationNinjas(LearningWorl.summary: In Japan young people learn the ancient ways of the Ninja. These illusive figures play an important part in Japanese mythology and hold a fascination for many within the country and beyond. In a school in Yokahama students learn their skills and philosophy as a fun way of improving themselves.

Soke-AShortDocumentaryAboutTafanHong.name: Soke - A Short Documentary About Tafan Hong
Soke-AShortDocumentaryAboutTafanHong.summary: Here's a shout out to our student, Austin Millinder, who filmed a documentary on our Soke for his school project in 2012. ARM Productions presents: A short documentary about Soke Tafan Hong: a Ninjutsu practitioner and owner of "The Way of the Shadow Martial Arts Academy".

TheBenefitsOfTrainingInMartialArts.#Ninj.name: The benefits of training in martial arts. #ninja #ninjutsu #ninpo
TheBenefitsOfTrainingInMartialArts.#Ninj.summary: The benefits of training in martial arts.
